Nov 23 (Reuters) -

  • AWS - COMPAGNIE FINANCIÈRE RICHEMONT SA IS MOVING ITS ENTIRE ENTERPRISE IT INFRASTRUCTURE TO AMAZON WEB SERVICES

  • AWS - RICHEMONT WILL CLOSE ITS EUROPEAN DATA CENTERS & MIGRATE ADDITIONAL DATA CENTERS IN HONG KONG & U.S. TO AWS BY END OF 2022
